languages.text: "Я определенно смогу исправить ваше тело от последствий этого шага. Но не травмы, нанесенные разуму".
"While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."
languages.original_text: "Я определенно смогу исправить ваше тело от последствий этого шага. Но не травмы, нанесенные разуму".

traits.locale_text: "I'll definitely be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision. The mental trauma, not so much."
"I'll definitely be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision. The mental trauma, not so much."
"I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision. The mental trauma, not so much."
"I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision. The mental trauma, not so much."
"While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."
"While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

languages.text: «Podré librar a su cuerpo de las consecuencias de esta decisión, sin duda, pero no puedo decir lo mismo de su mente».
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

traits.locale_text: «Podré librar a su cuerpo de las consecuencias de esta decisión, sin duda, pero no puedo decir lo mismo de su mente».

languages.text: 「この判断がもたらす結果をお体から取り除くことはできるだろうが、お心に対して同じことは言えん」
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

traits.locale_text: 「この判断がもたらす結果をお体から取り除くことはできるだろうが、お心に対して同じことは言えん」

languages.text: “尽管我肯定能让你的身体免受这个决定的影响，但我无法保证你的精神也能免遭磨难。”
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

traits.locale_text: “尽管我肯定能让你的身体免受这个决定的影响，但我无法保证你的精神也能免遭磨难。”

languages.text: "Ich werde mit Sicherheit in der Lage sein, Euren Körper von den Konsequenzen dieser Entscheidung zu befreien, aber für Euren Geist kann ich das nicht behaupten."
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde mit Sicherheit in der Lage sein, Euren Körper von den Konsequenzen dieser Entscheidung zu befreien, aber für Euren Geist kann ich das nicht behaupten."

languages.text: « Bien que je pense pouvoir éliminer les conséquences de votre décision de votre corps, je doute de pouvoir faire de même avec votre esprit. »
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que je pense pouvoir éliminer les conséquences de votre décision de votre corps, je doute de pouvoir faire de même avec votre esprit. »

languages.text: "Bedenini bu kararının neticesinden arındırabileceğime kuşku olmasa da zihnin için aynı şeyi söyleyemem."
languages.original_text: "While I will certainly be able to rid your body of the consequences of this decision, I cannot say the same for your mind."
